document_data.name: House of Glory
document_data.inhabitants: Inhabitants of the House of Glory
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of Glory''' was a temple to [[Tempus]], the Lord of Battles, found in the city of [[Tantras]] in [[the Vast]].
document_data.Location: The House of Glory lay on the northeastern edge of the city.
document_data.History:
During the [[Time of Troubles]] of the [[1358 DR|Year of Shadows, 1358 DR]], the deity [[Torm]] resided at [[Temple of Torm's Coming|his temple]] in Tantras. Torm's zealous priests began persecuting followers of other faiths in the city as "unbelievers". Meanwhile, the House of Glory was damaged in an accidentally started fire.It is not known if or how the House of Glory was affected by this religious persecution.

Nevertheless, the House of Glory remained active through to [[1367 DR]] and past [[1370 DR]].
document_data.Inhabitants: In [[1358 DR]], the temple was led by High Battlemaster [[Thiotar Umbarton]], with sixteen priests and twenty-two lay-followers.
